mods.abstract: Temple of Horus forecourt at Edfu (Ptolemaic Period); begun by Ptolemy III and completed by Ptolemy XII, the sandstone temple as seen from the colonnaded forecourt, four Egyptian men (right); temple with pyramidal sides supported by papyrus columns, lintel with the winged solar disk (center) and cornice (background); "Haute Egypte Temple d'Edfou" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of the Friends of Egyptology, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
